titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to allow for reimbursement of certain travel at a set rate, and for other purposes.
To amend title 38, United States Code, to allow for reimbursement of certain travel at a set rate, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay travel expenses for veterans receiving treatment at Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) facilities at the rate of 41.5 cents per mile. (Under current law the rate is that provided to federal employees in connection with the performance of official duties.) Requires an annual report concerning such expenses.
